sentences.english: You crouch on the fire escape, sweating in your dark clothes, staring into this bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 你蹲伏在消防通道上，汗流浃背，观察着浴室。
这么热的天使我汗流浃背。

sentences.english: When people sweat, they lose water through their skin.
sentences.chinese: 当人们汗流浃背，他们通过皮肤失去水份。
这个人汗流浃背，气喘吁吁地停了下来并点了点头。

sentences.english: Say you are worried about having to speak publicly and sweating profusely.
sentences.chinese: 说你担心在公共场合演讲，你感到汗流浃背。

sentences.english: When dawn came, he was sweating all over himself.
sentences.chinese: 当黎明来临时，他汗流浃背。

sentences.english: Harris was sweating and cursing by the time they reached the lock.
sentences.chinese: 当他们来到水闸时，哈里斯已是汗流浃背，骂不绝口。

sentences.english: Thetis was sweating all over to see his work.
sentences.chinese: 忒提斯看到他正在汗流浃背地工作。

sentences.english: He was sweating mightily in his unseasonable suit.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着不合时令的西装而汗流浃背。

sentences.english: I was sweat-soaked and sucking air like a beached grouper .
sentences.chinese: 我汗流浃背，象一条搁浅的石斑鱼一样吸着空气。
